title: Ticket #895: Conversion of CREAM resource names broken in condor_submit
description:
The way we name a CREAM resource in the GridResource attribute is slightly different than what the standard CREAM client accepts. We attempt to convert from the latter to the former in condor_submit, but get it wrong.

This is what we expect in GridResource: 

https://foo.edu:8443/ce-cream/services/CREAM2 pbs cream_queue

This is the normal way to name a CREAM resource to the standard client UI: 

https://foo.edu:8443/cream-pbs-cream_queue

The C++ client API expects to see the full URL from the first format, with pbs and cream_queue inserted in the job description (JDL).

In converting between the two formats, condor_submit omits the path in the URL. It should be fixed to include the path.
